match.series: England Women tour of South Africa, 2016

commentary.line: England Women have won the toss and have opted to field

England Women (From): Charlotte Edwards(c), Tammy Beaumont, Sarah Taylor(w), Amy Jones, Heather Knight, Danielle Wyatt, Jenny Gunn, Georgia Elwiss, Anya Shrubsole, Danielle Hazell, Rebecca Grundy, Natalie Sciver, Lydia Greenway, Lauren Winfield, Tash Farrant

South Africa Women (From): Dane van Niekerk, Trisha Chetty(w), Mignon du Preez(c), Marizanne Kapp, Lizelle Lee, Dinesha Devnarain, Chloe Tryon, Shabnim Ismail, Sune Luus, Masabata Klaas, Moseline Daniels, Yolani Fourie, Ayabonga Khaka, Lara Goodall, Marcia Letsoalo
